name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In fact, if you search for "egg fried rice" on Bilibili, you will find that there are a large number of egg fried rice contents uploaded around October 24 and November 25 every year - you can think this is a coincidence, or you can think that everyone is commemorating the "Egg Fried Rice Festival", it just depends on whether you want it or not.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Notice

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: User contributions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 27, two primary schools in Zhejiang jointly held the "1,000-person Fried Rice Competition"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The news was released by the Zhejiang Provincial Government Information Office's official Weibo account "Beautiful Zhejiang"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, Beautiful Zhejiang deleted the Weibo post about the Fried Rice Contest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 28, at a forced demolition site in Guangdong, an old lady collapsed on the ground and cried heartbreakingly, watching her home being demolished bit by bit.
It is reported that the old lady's husband was once a first-class combat hero of the Third Division of the People's Liberation Army Air Force

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 27, Shenzhen, Guangdong. 
Hundreds of migrant workers came to Shenzhen Longguang Group to ask for their wages, but not only did they fail to get their wages, but they were driven away by a large number of police. 
In the early morning of the 28th, the area around the Longguang Group building was blocked and the workers could no longer enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of November 27, a video showed that the corridor of a maternity and child hospital in Hebei was filled with adults and children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 27, a woman from Jiaxing, Zhejiang, went to Beijing to petition because her house was forcibly demolished. She was followed by plainclothes police for a long time. No matter where she went, the "guards" behind her always followed her closely. As of the time of posting, the woman said that these people had been following her for a year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 27, a civil servant from Northeast China said in a live broadcast that the government could barely pay out 3,000 yuan in wages, but the housing fund had been in arrears for two months. In addition, when party members go to the grassroots to help the poor, they have to pay for their own car fares, transportation fees, food expenses, and even gifts for poor households.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Currently, the account of food writer Wang Gang cannot be directly searched on Weibo.
(The account has not been destroyed, but the user cannot be searched)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the "China Youth Development Survey" initiated and hosted by the China Survey and Data Center (NSRC) of Renmin University of China conducted a questionnaire survey on nearly 60,000 young people aged 18-35, using the survey data to comprehensively understand the problem of young people "lying flat". The survey results show that only 12.8% of young people lie down or want to lie down. 28.5% of young people live a 45-degree life of neither rolling up nor lying down. 58.7% of young people stand upright and face challenges unremittingly. After the release of the questionnaire survey, it triggered widespread discussion among netizens. One netizen commented: It turns out that abiding by the labor law is also called lying down."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Shanxi Provincial Rural Revitalization Bureau spent 8.59 million yuan to purchase a poverty prevention monitoring information project, which attracted attention. On November 28, the General Office of the Shanxi Provincial Rural Revitalization Bureau responded: The bureau has paid attention to the online doubts about the project and is currently verifying the situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently in Shanghai, a woman cried in front of the camera, saying that she submitted countless resumes every day, but in the end, she either read them but didn't reply, or didn't even read the messages.
I studied hard for more than ten years, and the achievements I was proud of now seem so ridiculous"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 28, the Global Times reported that "American life expectancy has declined for three consecutive years", which caused ridicule from netizens.
Netizens: The honeymoon period is so short

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of November 28, at the North Campus of Yangling Vocational and Technical College in Xianyang, Shaanxi, a male student stabbed two classmates, a male and a female, with a knife. The female student is now said to have died from her injuries.
It is reported that the incident started when two students had a conflict during class and started to curse each other, and then the situation escalated, and the girl came to mediate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 26, Henan Village Bank depositors went to Nanyang, Henan again to protest with banners, demanding the return of their deposits.
They were then all arrested.
Henan Village Bank depositors still showed their extraordinary strong ability to act despite being under close surveillance for a long time. And it has been nearly 600 days since their deposits were frozen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Errata, after netizens pointed out that this information is not recent, but about half a year to a year ago, I apologize to everyone.
Because I received a lot of recent unemployment information on BOSS Zhipin and Maimai the day before, which was similar to the content described in the picture, I mistakenly thought that the information in the picture was also recent news and released it rashly, causing misunderstandings. Sorry, I will be more rigorous in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of November 21, Qingdao Huanghai College.
A student was rolled under a black car in the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Medical insurance collection has begun, leaders require everyone to put down their current work, do their best to collect medical insurance, and achieve "seven leading payment"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The route map of the depositors who set out from Hangzhou to Henan for the protest.
In order to avoid the pursuit and interception in Henan, they had to go far away and travel thousands of miles to enter Nanyang Xinye in Henan via Hubei.
Some depositors were intercepted by Henan police in Anhui and Hubei, and other depositors were arrested collectively in Xinye.
All the depositors who participated in the protest were arrested and taken to the Nanyang Xinye Public Security Bureau, where they were restricted from life freedom for 48 hours, and then detained for seven to fourteen days.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hong Kong independent media reported that on November 26, a young man was holding a white paper on the streets of Causeway Bay, Hong Kong, and some citizens went to take pictures or encourage him. When he left, he was stopped and questioned by plainclothes police who were monitoring the scene.
